trans-unit.source: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an audit rule for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 代表定義的檔案或目錄的稽核規則的存取控制項目 (ACE) 的抽象概念。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemAuditRule class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: FileSystemAuditRule 類別代表基礎存取控制項目 (ACE)，指定使用者帳戶，以提供 （讀取、 寫入和等等），存取類型的抽象概念，以及是否要進行稽核。

trans-unit.source: This class can also specify how audit rules are inherited from and propagated to objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別也可以指定如何繼承自和傳播到物件稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: To permit file and directory auditing on Windows NT or later, you must enable Audit Access Security policy on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 若要允許檔案及目錄的稽核 Windows NT 或更新版本，您必須在電腦上啟用稽核存取安全性原則。

trans-unit.source: By default, this policy is set to No Auditing.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此原則設定為無稽核。

trans-unit.source: To enable the Audit Access Security policy, perform the following steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用稽核存取安全性原則，執行下列步驟︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Open the **Local Security Settings** Microsoft Management Console (MMC) snap-in, located in the Administrative Tools folder.
trans-unit.target: 開啟**本機安全性設定**Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 嵌入式管理單元，位於 [系統管理工具] 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: Expand the Local Policies folder and left-click the Audit Policy folder.
trans-unit.target: 展開 [本機原則] 資料夾，然後以滑鼠左鍵按一下 [稽核原則] 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Double-click the **Audit object access** entry on the right pane of the MMC snap-in, or right-click and choose Properties to display the **Audit object access properties** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下**稽核物件存取**項目，在右窗格中的 MMC 嵌入式管理單元，或以滑鼠右鍵按一下並選擇 屬性 以顯示**稽核物件存取屬性** 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: Select the **Success** or **Failure** check boxes to log successes or failures.
trans-unit.target: 選取**成功**或**失敗**核取方塊，以記錄成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: Note that an audit rule for a user account requires a corresponding access rule for the same user account.
trans-unit.target: 請注意使用者帳戶的稽核規則，需要有對應的存取規則，對相同的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Use the FileSystemAuditRule class to create a new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立新的稽核規則使用 FileSystemAuditRule 類別。

trans-unit.source: You can persist this rule using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保存這項規則<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>類別。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶、 指定的稽核規則相關聯的作業類型的值和值，指定何時執行稽核的參考。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的稽核規則，您可以保存使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>類別。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged.
trans-unit.target: 稽核規則會決定何時以及如何系統物件上執行的動作例如檔案和資料夾，會記錄。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>封裝的使用者帳戶的參考物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定的稽核規則相關聯的作業類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref>值，指定何時執行稽核。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: identity 參數不是物件。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The identity parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the flags parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 flags 參數。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value was passed to the flags parameter.
trans-unit.target: -或- 值已傳遞給 flags 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> class using a user account name, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶名稱、 值，指定的稽核規則相關聯的作業類型和值，指定何時執行稽核。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user account.
trans-unit.target: 使用者帳戶的名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定的稽核規則相關聯的作業類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref>值，指定何時執行稽核。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the flags parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 flags 參數。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value was passed to the flags parameter.
trans-unit.target: -或- 值已傳遞給 flags 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> class using the name of a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶，一個值，指定的稽核規則、 值，決定如何繼承的權限、 權限傳播所決定的值和值，指定何時執行稽核與相關聯的作業類型的參考名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的稽核規則，您可以保存使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>類別。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged.
trans-unit.target: 稽核規則會決定何時以及如何系統物件上執行的動作例如檔案和資料夾，會記錄。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>封裝的使用者帳戶的參考物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定的稽核規則相關聯的作業類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> values that specifies how access masks are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>值，指定存取遮罩傳播到子物件的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> values that specifies how Access Control Entries (ACEs) are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref>值，指定如何將存取控制項目 (Ace) 傳播到子物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref>值，指定何時執行稽核。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: identity 參數不是物件。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The identity parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the flags parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 flags 參數。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value was passed to the flags parameter.
trans-unit.target: -或- 值已傳遞給 flags 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶、 指定的稽核規則相關聯的作業類型的值，決定如何繼承的權限的值、 值，決定如何傳播的權限，和值，指定何時執行稽核名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user account.
trans-unit.target: 使用者帳戶的名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定的稽核規則相關聯的作業類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> values that specifies how access masks are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>值，指定存取遮罩傳播到子物件的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> values that specifies how Access Control Entries (ACEs) are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref>值，指定如何將存取控制項目 (Ace) 傳播到子物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref>值，指定何時執行稽核。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> flags associated with the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>目前相關聯的旗標<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> flags associated with the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"> </xref>目前相關聯的旗標<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref>物件。
